description:
On Meg’s seventeenth birthday, she learns that she only has one year left to live. Her mentor—the Eternal Witch, Faust—explains that she is cursed and the only way to save herself is to grow a seed of life using one thousand tears of joy. Of course, such tears aren’t easy to come by. As Meg begins her quest, she finds herself drawn into the lives of her friends and neighbors in ways she never imagined. By sharing their burdens and using her magic to comfort them, she learns how precious those moments of connection can be even in the face of death.

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: ある魔女が死ぬまで -終わりの言葉と始まりの涙-
Aru Majo ga Shinu Made: Owari no Kotoba to Hajimari no Namida
Once Upon a Witch's Death: The Tale of the One Thousand Tears of Joy

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.
